author: Farah Najjar
title: Russia-Ukraine talks due as battle for Kharkiv rages – Live news
description: Ukraine’s military says Russian forces are ‘continuing shelling in all directions’ as Kyiv and Moscow prepare for talks.
content:
• Talks between Ukraine and Russia are due to begin on Monday morning near the Belarusian border, reports TASS news agency.
